# [Interview #988: West Jordan Signing Report - Josh & Mi'ch, Entry #29](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=988#29)

#### Question

People will be making your books into movies soon, right?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I’m hoping, we’re trying.

#### QUESTION

Which one first?

#### BRANDON SANDERSON

Mistborn, we’re working very hard to try and get it made. I can’t promise but we’re trying.
